entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
